334.text:

429.text: and New Zealand, for undergraduate students they have a big emphasis on the importance

434.text:

439.text:

444.text:

448.text:

453.text:
UK universities, particularly for say, an

458.text: and New Zealand system is something of a halfway house, between the UK approach and the

464.text: US approach, where in America you have a very, very hand held type approach by the academics

471.text: particularly in your first and second year. So the Aussies and Kiwis are somewhere in

476.text: the middle, so you're going to have a higher number of contact teaching hours

479.text: than you would in the UK, but you're going to have more independence and the onus is going to be
